Articles.Content:
TL;DR version - How do you move up and down with an EVA'd kerbal?

I'm sure this has been asked before but 'eva' is not a long enough phrase to search the forums with. Usually the first thing that happens to me after turning on the jetpack is I lose altitude relative to my ship, and from then on I'm pretty much stranded in the void.

The WASD keys only cover two of the three dimensions, and the RCS translation controls don't seem to do anything.. I can't find anything in the controls settings either. There must be something I'm missing.
